Platform.Title: Khodursky Lab E. coli B 4290 ORFs Microarray
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: 4290 amplified ORFs from primer pairs (from Sigma Genosys) were printed onto glass slides using a 16 tip robotic printer from 384-well microwell plates
Platform.Description: A microarray with 4405 spot features. Tip Configuration: Standard 16-tip

Column.Name: GENE_SYMBOL
Column.Description: Name of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Column.Name: GENE_DESC
Column.Description: Description of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Sample.Title: TLM-15

Channel.Source: E. coli - 0 min before nutrient shift
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Cells harvested at mid-exponential phase, spun, washed twice with M9 medium and shifted to limiting or no thymine medium. Samples taken at listed intervals.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: E. coli MG1655 thyA- cells grown in M9 minimal medium + 0.2% glucose and 20 ug/ml thymine
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using QIAGEN RNeasy kit according to manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: Labeling and hybing procedure according to Khodursky et al, Methods Mol Biol. 2003;224:61-78

Channel.Source: E. coli - 15 min after shift to limiting medium
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Cells harvested at mid-exponential phase, spun, washed twice with M9 medium and shifted to limiting or no thymine medium. Samples taken at listed intervals.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: E. coli MG1655 thyA- cells grown in M9 minimal medium + 0.2% glucose and 20 ug/ml thymine
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using QIAGEN RNeasy kit according to manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Labeling and hybing procedure according to Khodursky et al, Methods Mol Biol. 2003;224:61-78

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Labeling and hybing procedure according to Khodursky et al, Methods Mol Biol. 2003;224:61-78
Sample.Data-Processing: Lowess normalized data. Resultant data is log2 normalized.

Series.Title: Thymine starvation and limitation in Escherichia coli thyA- cells
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profiling of responses of E. coli thymine auxotrophs to i) growth under sub-optimal thymine concentration (TLM) and ii) lethal conditions under complete thymine starvation (TLD).
Series.Overall-Design: Thymine limitation: Time series following shift to limiting thymine concentrations (15, 30, 45, 60 and 90 mins) - single replicate. Thymine starvation: Time series following shift to zero thymine medium (15, 30, 45, 60 and 90 mins) - 2 biological replicates at each time point.
